AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Plan
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Sales Invoice Payment Plans
AD_TAB.HELP: Sales invoice payment plan information is shown grouped in two sections.
AD_TAB.WHERECLAUSE: FIN_Payment_Schedule.outstandingamt <> 0 and exists (select 1 from c_invoice i where i.c_invoice_id = FIN_Payment_Schedule.c_invoice_id and i.issotrx = 'Y')

AD_TAB.NAME: Accounting
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Accounting information related to the doubtful debt
AD_TAB.HELP: Accounting information related to the doubtful debt
AD_TAB.HQLORDERBYCLAUSE: accountingSchema.name, accountingDate, abs(debit) desc, credit desc, value

AD_TAB.NAME: Add Multiple Payments P&E
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: User can select multiple payments at the same time. The system will create a separate transaction per selected payment
AD_TAB.HELP: User can select multiple payments at the same time. The system will create a separate transaction per selected payment
AD_TAB.HQLWHERECLAUSE: e.status in ('RPR', 'PPM') and e.amount <> 0 and exists (select 1 from FinancialMgmtFinAccPaymentMethod as fapm join fapm.account as fa where fapm.paymentMethod = e.paymentMethod and fa.id = @FIN_Financial_Account.id@ and (case when e.receipt = true then fapm.payinAllow else fapm.payoutAllow end) = true and fa.currency = e.account.currency) and not exists (select 1 from FIN_Finacc_Transaction as ft where e = ft.finPayment) and exists (select 1 from OrganizationTree as ot where ot.organization.id = e.organization.id and ot.parentOrganization.id = @FIN_Financial_Account.organization@ and ot.client.id = e.client.id)
AD_TAB.FILTERNAME: Payments are filtered by the selected Financial Account

AD_TAB.NAME: Accounting History
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Accounting history
AD_TAB.HELP: This tab shows the accounting history of a given transaction.
AD_TAB.ORDERBYCLAUSE: DateAcct desc, Fin_FinAcc_Transaction_ID, Fact_Acct_Group_ID desc, seqno desc
AD_TAB.HQLORDERBYCLAUSE: accountingSchema.name, accountingDate, abs(debit) desc, credit desc, value

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Plan
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Sales Invoice Payment Plans
AD_TAB.HELP: Purchase invoice payment plan information is shown grouped in two sections.
AD_TAB.WHERECLAUSE: FIN_Payment_Schedule.outstandingamt <> 0 and exists (select 1 from c_invoice i where i.c_invoice_id = FIN_Payment_Schedule.c_invoice_id and i.issotrx = 'N')

AD_TAB.NAME: Doubtful Debts Process
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Doubtful debts are those debts which a business or individual is unlikely to be able to collect.
AD_TAB.HELP: Doubtful debts are those debts which a business or individual is unlikely to be able to collect. The reasons for potential non payment can include disputes over supply, delivery, at the conditioner of item or the appearance of financial stress within a customer's operations. When such a dispute occurs it is prudent to add this debt or portion thereof to the doubtful debt reserve.
AD_TAB.HQLWHERECLAUSE: (e.fINDoubtfulDebtRun.id = @FIN_DoubtFul_Debt_Run.id@ OR e.fINDoubtfulDebtRun.id IS NULL OR e.fINDoubtfulDebtRun.id = '') and e.rundate = to_date(@FIN_DoubtFul_Debt_Run.rundate@, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AD_TAB.HQLFILTERCLAUSE: e.fINDoubtfulDebtRun.id = @FIN_DoubtFul_Debt_Run.id@ OR (e.fINDoubtfulDebtRun.id IS NULL AND to_number(@FIN_DoubtFul_Debt_Run.Daysoverdue@)<=e.daysOverdue AND ((@FIN_DoubtFul_Debt_Run.businessPartner@ is null OR @FIN_DoubtFul_Debt_Run.businessPartner@ = '') OR (@FIN_DoubtFul_Debt_Run.businessPartner@ is not null and e.businessPartner.id = @FIN_DoubtFul_Debt_Run.businessPartner@)) AND ((@FIN_DoubtFul_Debt_Run.businessPartnerCategory@ is null OR @FIN_DoubtFul_Debt_Run.businessPartnerCategory@ = '') OR (@FIN_DoubtFul_Debt_Run.businessPartnerCategory@ is not null and e.businessPartnerCategory.id = @FIN_DoubtFul_Debt_Run.businessPartnerCategory@)))

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Plan
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: List of scheduled payments expected against a particular invoice and payment plan associated with that invoice.
AD_TAB.HELP: The payment plan tab lists the scheduled payments expected against the invoice.

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Details
AD_TAB.HELP: Displays the details of the payments (pre-payments or regular payments) made for the order or for the invoice/s of the order.

AD_TAB.NAME: Cleared items
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Cleared transactions
AD_TAB.HELP: This tab shows the transactions cleared or set as matched in a reconciliation.

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Plan
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: List of scheduled payments expected against a particular invoice and payment plan associated with that invoice.
AD_TAB.HELP: The payment plan tab lists the scheduled payments expected against the invoice.

AD_TAB.NAME: Pick and Edit Lines
AD_TAB.HQLWHERECLAUSE: (e.obSelected = true and e.paymentProposal.id = @FIN_Payment_Proposal.id@) or (e.obSelected = false and e.salesTransaction = false and e.currency.id= @FIN_Payment_Proposal.currency@ and (@FIN_Payment_Proposal.businessPartner@ is null OR @FIN_Payment_Proposal.businessPartner@ = '' OR @FIN_Payment_Proposal.businessPartner@ = e.businessPartner.id) and (@FIN_Payment_Proposal.duedate@ = '' OR @FIN_Payment_Proposal.duedate@ is null OR @FIN_Payment_Proposal.duedate@ = 'null' OR e.expectedDate <= to_date(@FIN_Payment_Proposal.duedate@,'YYYY-MM-DD')))
AD_TAB.HQLORDERBYCLAUSE: obSelected desc, paymentPriority, expectedDate, coalesce(orderDocumentno, invoiceorderDocumentno)

AD_TAB.NAME: Financial Account Defaults
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Default accounts for the financial accounts in this accounting schema
AD_TAB.HELP: Default ledger accounts for the financial accounts.

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Details
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: List of payment made details against a particular invoice based on the payment in plan..
AD_TAB.HELP: This tab displays the details of the payments made against the invoice.

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Plan (old)
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: List of scheduled payments in expected against a particular invoice and payment plan associated with that invoice.
AD_TAB.HELP: The payment plan tab lists the scheduled payments expected against the invoice.

AD_TAB.NAME: Find Transactions to Match
AD_TAB.FILTERNAME: Transactions prior to Bank Statement Line's Transaction Date

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Details
AD_TAB.HELP: Displays the details of the payments (pre-payments or regular payments) received for the order or for the invoice/s of the order.

AD_TAB.NAME: Order Invoices
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Grid to select orders and invoices to be paid
AD_TAB.HELP: Grid to select orders and invoices to be paid

AD_TAB.NAME: GL Item
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Grid to add G/L Items as part of a given payment
AD_TAB.HELP: Grid to add G/L Items as part of a given payment

AD_TAB.NAME: Credit To Use
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Grid to select the credit to use in the current payment
AD_TAB.HELP: Grid to select the credit to use in the current payment

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Plan (old)
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: List of scheduled payments expected against a particular invoice and payment plan associated with that invoice.
AD_TAB.HELP: List of the scheduled payments expected against the invoice.

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Plan
AD_TAB.HELP: Shows the total amount expected to be collected upon order booking as well as the amount/s pre-paid or paid against the invoice/s for the order.

AD_TAB.NAME: Match Statement
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: Grid for match statements
AD_TAB.HELP: Grid for match statements

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Details
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: List of payment made details against a particular invoice based on the payment in plan..
AD_TAB.HELP: This tab displays the details of the payments made against the invoice.

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Details (old)
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: List of payments made details against a particular invoice based on the payment plan
AD_TAB.HELP: This tab displays the details of the payments made against the invoice.

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Plan
AD_TAB.HELP: Shows the total amount expected to be paid upon order booking as well as the amount/s pre-paid or paid against the invoice/s for the order.

AD_TAB.NAME: Payment Details (old)
AD_TAB.DESCRIPTION: List of payment made details against a particular invoice based on the payment in plan..
AD_TAB.HELP: Display the details of the payments received against the invoice.

AD_TAB.NAME: Accounting
AD_TAB.HELP: The accounting tab is a read-only tab which showa every financial account transaction posting.
AD_TAB.ORDERBYCLAUSE: DateAcct desc, c_acctschema_id, Fact_Acct_Group_ID, docbasetype , Fin_FinAcc_Transaction_ID, seqno desc

AD_TAB.NAME: Reconciliations
AD_TAB.HELP: The reconciliation tab shows the reconciliations created manually if no matching algorithm is assigned to the financial account as well as the ones created while matching an imported bank statement file otherwise.
